nodes.text: Rebel Marksmen, also known as Rebel Sharpshooters, were snipers who served in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. They carried carried E-17d sniper rifles or A280 blaster rifles.[source?]
The Rodian Sniper and Sullustan Recon Sharpshooter were both members of their respective species which was trained for precision shooting. The Rebel allance also employed Tognath Marksmen.
Rebel Marksmen appeared in the 2014 mobile apps Star Wars: Galactic Defense and Star Wars: Commander., and the 2017 video game Star Wars Battlefront II.
